explains: v. 创造；建立；造成（create 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: created in china 中国创造

sentences.en: The machinery of democracy could be created quickly.
sentences.cn: 民主体制很快就能建立起来。

sentences.en: Recovery can't be sustained unless more jobs are created.
sentences.cn: 除非有更多的工作机会被创造出来，否则复苏无法保持下去。

sentences.en: Volcanic activity has created thermal springs and boiling mud pools.
sentences.cn: 火山活动产生了温泉和沸腾的泥浆池。
